name: Grand Values: Monaco
summary: Grand Values: Monaco is an exciting story-driven 3D stealth game about the young thief, Amy, and her friends descending into danger and infamy against the filthy-rich millionaires of Monaco. With a dramatic new pickpocket mechanic for the big steals, a focus on the fun of stealth gameplay, and a cartoon art style different from anything else in the genre, it represents a unique offering to the player – both stealth aficionados and those new to this style of game.
